preferences.title: Enable automatic sorting
preferences.description: Every time you add, change or move a bookmark the folder containing the item will be sorted.
preferences.name: mustAutoSort

preferences.title: Sort the folders first
preferences.description: When sorting the folders will appear before all the bookmarks
preferences.name: mustSortFolderFirst

preferences.title: Add button to toolbar
preferences.description:
Add a button to access the advanced options in the toolbar.
The button can also be moved in the menu using the Firerox's 'Customize' feature
preferences.name: isButtonEnabled

preferences.title: Advanced options
preferences.description:
Open a tab containing the 'Advanced options'.
Advanced options allows to sort all bookmarks and blacklist some folders.
preferences.label: Advanced options
preferences.name: openAdvancedOptions
